Body:
t = '18:01:46 up 62 days, 18:27,  1 user,  load average: 0.09, 30.04, 0.05'
monkeypatch.setattr(Connection, 'run', lambda self, x, warn:
    get_mock_ssh_text(t, 0))
ssh_ctx = ssh.SshContext('ubuntu', get_mock_key_file(tmpdir))
with pytest.raises(ValidationFailure):
    ssh.LoadAverageValidation(ssh_ctx, hosts=hosts).expect_max_5_minute_load(20
        ).perform({})
